mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customer WHERE custom_id = #{col1} AND custom_id is not null

SELECT sum(a.price*b.item_count) as price , sum((price-(a.price*(a.discount)))*b.item_Count) as total , sum(a.price*b.item_count*a.discount) as discount FROM basket b join item i on i.item_seq like b.item_seq join customer c on c.custom_id like b.custom_id join common_feature a on a.item_code like i.item_code WHERE i.item_seq = b.item_seq AND b.custom_id = #{customid} AND a.item_code = i.item_code
SELECT i.item_name as itemName , i.color_exp as colorExp , i.item_seq as itemSeq , i.pic_name as picName , i.item_code as itemCode FROM item i join common_feature c on i.item_code like c.item_code

SELECT item_name as itemName , basket_seq as basketSeq , pic_name as picName , i.item_seq as itemSeq , a.item_code as itemCode , item_count as itemCount , price , price-(a.price*(a.discount)) as discountPrice , (price-(a.price*(a.discount)))*b.item_Count as total , i.texture_exp as textureExp FROM basket b join item i on i.item_seq like b.item_seq join common_feature a on a.item_code like i.item_code WHERE i.item_seq = b.item_seq AND b.custom_id = #{customid}
SELECT count , sell_date as sellDate FROM chart WHERE item_code=item_code GROUP BY sell_date,item_code,sell_date
